title: 为什么我安装了JAVA却提示JAVA不是可运行程序
author: hzdl
txt_content:
求大佬解决
谢谢

replies.author: 阴阳师元素祭祀
replies.txt_content:
添加环境变量PATH到java.exe所在路径或者
"....java.exe" ....
这样直接绝对引用起来

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content: 安装 jre 即可 https://javadl.oracle.com/webapp ... 33b84d0e960903adac8
